name: Skate Rush 3D
description:
Skateboarding is no easy sport; dare to be a part of the Skate Rush 3D tournaments?

Hop on the deck and race against the coolest crew in town! You gotta show double backflips and smooth grinding skills to become a top player. Reach boost mode by landing bolts!

Try new tricks and flip in the air to challenge yourself in the game. How smooth is your crooked grind? Show off on the ramp. Don’t be afraid to restart if you fail at first!

Do you think you have what it takes to master skateboarding? Let’s find out!

Features:
-Thrilling skate experience
-Win in the tournaments & beat others!
-Unlock fever boost mode
